TopicTitle: Landing the Spacebrain XL on Laythe (and returning to orbit)

Articles.Content:
In which I land and return a 3-man spaceplane from Laythe to orbit, using only stock parts. As it happens it's a rescue mission to pick up a stranded Kerbonaut, but it's also my first attempt at making a Kerbal Space Program LP video

Let me know if you have similar designs, videos, or crafts. I'm now playing around with B9 and Ferram mods, should result in cooler and more powerful planes for all. I hope you enjoy!


Mods I'm using: Chatterer, Kerbal Alarm Clock, Kerbal Beautification pack (cloud mod). All parts and physics are stock, except the MK3 cabin interior for IVA.
